name: Cheddar, Herb & Garlic Biscuits
description: Warm, homemade biscuits add a comforting touch to any family dinner.
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C).
  2. Mix together flour, baking powder, Herb & Garlic Dip Mix and Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend.
  3. Using a pastry blender, combine butter with dry mixture until pieces are the size of small peas. Stir in cheddar. Add milk and stir to fully incorporate.
  4. Turn dough out onto a clean, floured surface and gently knead 6 – 8 times. Pat dough out to a thickness of approximately 1⁄2” and cut to desired shape.
  5. Place biscuits onto Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and bake for 15 minutes, or until lightly browned.
